# technitium Provider



## Example Usage

```terraform
terraform {
  required_providers {
    technitium = {
      source = "registry.terraform.io/kenske/technitium"
    }
  }
}

provider "technitium" {
  host  = var.TECHNITIUM_HOST
  token = var.TECHNITIUM_TOKEN
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Optional

- `host` (String)
- `token` (String, Sensitive)
